Room.Name: Golgoth Frozen Falls
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing at the base of a frozen, hundred-meter waterfall.
Room.LongDescription: Around a particularly sharp corner of the trail the sparkling waterfall comes into view. It appears to be frozen in both time and space, and the light falling on it creates a kaleidascope of shifting rainbows and prismatic reflections. Closer examination reveals that a section of the waterfall is clearer, and slightly more transparent than the rest of it. The trail apparently ends here. Nice view.
